mapper.select: SELECT v.EMP_NO empNo, v.VCTN_DAY_CNT vctnDayCnt, v.VCTN_RSN vctnRsn, v.VCTN_RSD_CNT vctnRsdCnt, e.EMP_NM empNm, e.EMP_VCTN_TTL empVctnTtl FROM TB_VACATION v INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE e ON v.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LIMIT #{startList} , #{listSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_VACATION (EMP_NO, VCTN_DAY_CNT, VCTN_RSN, VCTN_RSD_CNT, VCTN_APL_DTM) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{vctnDayCnt}, #{vctnRsn}, #{vctnRsdCnt}, sysdate());
